title: The Hands of a Killer
description: When former Arkansas State Senator Linda Collins is found fatally stabbed outside her home, investigators must determine if her murder is connected to her political career or her personal life. Dennis Murphy reports.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
